required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Bridging Trial Comparing Org 25969 at 1-2 PTC in Japanese and Caucasian Subjects. Part B: Caucasian Subjects (19.4.209B)(P05974)
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi -Center, Randomized, Open -Label, Prospective Bridging, Parallel Dose-Finding Trial Comparing Efficacy, Safety and Pharmacokinetics of 4 Doses of Org 25969 and Placebo Administered at 1-2 PTC After Rocuronium or Vecuronium in Japanese and Caucasian Subjects. Part B: Caucasian Subjects.

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the trial was to establish the dose-response relation of Org 25969 given as a reversal agent of rocuronium or vecuronium at 1-2 PTC during sevoflurane anesthesia for Caucasian subjects

primary_outcome.measure: Time from start of administration of Org 25969 / placebo to recovery of the T4/T1 ratio to 0.9

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from start of administration of Org 25969 / placebo to recovery of the T4/T1 ratio to 0.7 and 0.8

intervention.description: 4 Doses of Sugammadex Administered at 1-2 PTC After 0.9 mg/kg Rocuronium or 0.1 mg/kg Vecuronium
4 Doses of placebo Administered at 1-2 PTC After Rocuronium or Vecuronium

link.description: Click here to access a synopsis of the study results.
